meanings.definition: A person who receives a grant of property or money.
meanings.sent1: The grantee was thrilled to inherit the old house.
meanings.sent2: The grantee of the scholarship was a hardworking student.
meanings.sent3: The grantee found a bag of money on the street and thought it was a prank.
meanings.sent4: She was like a grantee of good luck, always finding money on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The grantee of the treasure map followed the clues eagerly.

meanings.sent1: The organization will grantee funds to support the project.
meanings.sent2: He decided to grantee permission for the event to take place.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly granteeed her friend the title of 'Queen of Puns'.
meanings.sent4: The teacher granteeed success to those who worked hard in class.
meanings.sent5: The magician granteeed wishes to the audience with a wave of his wand.
